entry.value: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ods_empenho(%%00010seq_empenho INT,%%00010cod_municipio INT,%%00010seq_orgao INT,%%00010cod_unidade INT,%%00010cod_subunidade INT,%%00010seq_licitacao INT,%%00010seq_dispensa INT,%%00010seq_convenio INT,%%00010seq_contrato INT,%%00010seq_termo_aditivo INT,%%00010num_anoexercicio INT,%%00010num_mesexercicio INT,%%00010dsc_funcao STRING,%%00010dsc_subfuncao STRING,%%00010dsc_naturezadespesa STRING,%%00010dsc_programa STRING,%%00010dsc_acao STRING,%%00010dsc_subacao STRING,%%00010dsc_fonterecurso STRING,%%00010num_empenho STRING,%%00010dat_empenho STRING,%%00010vlr_empenhado DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_reforco DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_anulempenho DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_liquidacao DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_anulliquidacao DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_pagamento DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_anulpagamento DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_outrasbaixas DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_anuloutrasbaixas DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_rspprocessado DOUBLE,%%00010vlr_rspnaoprocessado DOUBLE)%%00010ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde'%%00010WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (%%00010 "separatorChar" = ";",%%00010 "quoteChar" = "\"",%%00010 "skip.header.line.count" = "1")%%00010STORED AS TEXTFILE%%00010LOCATION '/tmp/upload/empenho';%%00010
